price: 54. (Abraham) respondió: “Ciertamente, ustedes y sus antepasados han estado en un claro extravío”.
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
